pos: nouns which may take the genitive case particle 'no'
nouns which may take the genitive case particle 'no'

lessons.japanese: 空き巣に入られたんだ。
lessons.indonesian: Our house was robbed while we were away.

lessons.japanese: 空き部屋が３つあるが、そのうちのどれも使えない。
lessons.indonesian: We have three spare rooms, none of which can be used.

lessons.japanese: 空き部屋は三つありますが、どれも使用できません。
lessons.indonesian: We have three spare rooms, none of which can be used.

lessons.japanese: 空き部屋はありますか。
近くの空き地でキャッチボールをするのはどうですか。
lessons.indonesian: How about playing catch in the vacant lot near by?

lessons.japanese: わかった。機械が空きしだい送る。
lessons.indonesian: OK. I'll send it out as soon as a machine is available.

lessons.japanese: もう１人分の空きはありますか。
lessons.indonesian: Is there any space for one more person?

lessons.japanese: まだ空き部屋がいくつかあった。
lessons.indonesian: There were several rooms still vacant.

lessons.japanese: どうやら、そのみすぼらしいアパートは空き家のようだ。
lessons.indonesian: Apparently that shabby flat is vacant.

lessons.japanese: それらは空いているアパートか空き家だった。
lessons.indonesian: They were vacant apartments or homes.

lessons.japanese: その空き家はほこりでいっぱいだった。
lessons.indonesian: The empty house was full of dust.
The house is not occupied now.

lessons.japanese: そのみすぼらしいアパートは空き家のようだ。
